context: A potentially malicious URL click was detected, involving user Lucas Grey who clicked on `http://ym018491661.wittytree-b6f239d6.northeurope.azurecontainerapps.io/`. The suspicious activity then led to hardware discovery on the target device, which seems to have been done by another account.
question: What is the name of the account that was involved in the suspicious system hardware discovery incident?
solution_steps: The user with AadUserId `a2d0f7c2-b0a0-43bd-bce0-27d8ae3be4d0` clicked on a potentially malicious URL.
The account `pwilson` was involved in suspicious system hardware discovery.
